[h1]Portal and Partners[/h1]
It is said to have been inspired by [i]Narbacular Dorp[/i] and [i]The Power of paint[/i].
[list]
[*]The plot in single-person mode is tense and exciting, and the puzzles are clever.
[*]The two-person model requires close cooperation and brings a sense of accomplishment.
[/list]
Egg: Mod [i]Portal Reload[/i] has been released at Steam
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1255980/Portal_Reloaded/
incredibly interesting game with many great and challenging puzzles

Very good overall, just like the first game. The puzzles are good from start to finish, and the newer things in the second half keep things fresh. There's an actual story this time around, and while I don't think that was something lacking in the first Portal, it's definitely a positive addition. The dry, sarcastic, and sometimes bad humour keeps it from getting too serious and just works. My one complaint is the same that I had with the first Portal. You go from having very defined progression to being completely in the dark, and in Portal 2 that cycle repeats. I don't think you need to know exactly how far along you are in a game at all times, but it's somewhat annoying when you think you're almost done and still have half the game left. It's definitely not a dealbreaker; just a little annoyance worth mentioning.

Honestly, anyone who finds thrill and enjoyment though puzzle games will definitely have a blast playing this sequel. Itâ€™s puzzles are not easy sometimes, and will require you to stop and think thoroughly through which I think is great. The back story is interesting, and there are splats of humor here and there which really tie the package nicely. Finalizing this up, for people who are into puzzle/mystery types of games, I 99.9% recommend this game.

Holy macaroni sticks this game is ssssssssssssssssooooooooooo cool and funny though the replay ability is lacking I still go back and play it just cause the dialog is so good and funny everything make sense the motivations of each character and why they do what they do and my god is it funny nearly every time weatly is on scene it cracks me up the times when he don't are when he is not making a joke and every joke lands for me the plot is go and it has a scene were the they tell you why the main antagonist is testing you and the ending is brilliant if you going in blind then you are in for a treat. I think that no I know I would pay $100 for this game holy cow. The sound track is the bomb I listen to the credits song and the quire song a lot. I recommend that you search it up on YouTube and the way they implement them is so cool.
